=Version 2.1.2 release notes=

This release changed the licensing model from GPL3 to dual-licensed under MIT or GPL2.  The copyright banners were also updated.

Changed files:

  * changelog.txt
  * license.txt (removed)
  * gpl2-license.txt (new)
  * mit-license.txt (new)
  * readme.txt
  * tinyautosave/editor_plugin.js
  * tinyautosave/editor_plugin_src.js
  * demo/demo.htm

==Download==

You can grab version 2.1.2 on the [http://code.google.com/p/tinyautosave/downloads/list Downloads] page.
